name: breathe (itch) (dskzero)
description:
breathe is a short experimental platformer where you control a character to climb a tower and recover what was stolen.

It was developed to learn and experiment with the use of Gamemaker Studio 2 between the months of March and April 2020, under the quarantine generated by the coronavirus pandemic. Some people make bread, other learn sanskrit, I learned to make games.

Controls

Move using the arrows, jump with the spacebar.

Avoid things that look like they might kill you.

Don't stare.
